description:
**Tool Overview**:

The new Outlook client is an improved version of Microsoft's email client designed for enhancing productivity in daily work. 

**Details**:

This version provides a more user-friendly interface and better integration with Microsoft 365 services, making email management easier and more efficient. It features enhanced performance metrics, streamlined messaging, and integrated calendaring functionalities. Users can anticipate a decrease in loading times compared to the old Outlook client, promoting a smoother user experience. Furthermore, the new Outlook may offer better support for non-VSTO plugins, providing additional functionality that users can leverage.

Given the sunset of the old Outlook client by the end of 2025, transitioning to the new Outlook now can help users take advantage of its benefits ahead of time.
